attribute.name: nhcolor
attribute.description: Sets the RGBA values for the negative harmonics color of the ambisonic domain patchlines

attribute.name: phcolor
attribute.description: Sets the RGBA values for the positive harmonics color of the ambisonic domain patchlines

attribute.name: planecolor
attribute.description: Sets the RGBA values for the planewaves signals color of the planewaves domain patchlines

attribute.name: zhcolor
attribute.description: Sets the RGBA values for the zero harmonics color of the ambisonic domain patchlines
